channel.title: Another software installation?
channel.description:
I download VeracRypt for Debian,
Unpack archive
And type in terminal "sudo veracrypt-1.0f-1-setup-gui-x86", password..
but nothing :( Terminal answer "sudo: veracrypt-1.0f-1-setup-gui-x86: command not found"
WTF?? How to install this package on whonix?

item.title: Another software installation?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t think this is a Whonix specific issue. See also:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Design and Goals

Whonix ™ Overview. Online Anonymity via Tor and Security by Isolation. Based on Debian. Whonix ™ Architecture.

Most likely you missed the

./

i.e.

sudo ./veracrypt-1.0f-1-setup-gui-x86

This supposes the file is in your home folder. Otherwise you need the correct /path/to/file.

Read full topic
